doc.after: A tank is a tracked armoured fighting vehicle designed for front line combat and combines strong strategic and tactical offensive and defensive capabilities Firepower is normally provided by a large calibre main gun in a rotating turret and secondary machine guns while heavy armour and all terrain mobility provide protection for the tank and its crew allowing it to perform all primary tasks of the armoured troops on the battlefield
